entries.full_inventory_free_for_all: %TT inventory is full.  Unable to transfer %TO to %TT.  The item is available on the corpse for anyone to retrieve.
entries.unable_to_transfer: Unable to transfer %TO to %TT.  The item is available on the corpse for %TT to retrieve.
entries.uninvite_no_target_self: You must supply a target to uninvite.
entries.too_far_away_for_lottery__: You are too far away from the creature to participate in the lottery.
entries.still_waiting: Still waiting for your group members...
entries.set_new_master_looter: The Group Leader has set %TT as the master looter.
entries.selected_random: Group Leader selected Random as the loot type for the group.
entries.selected_master: Group Leader selected Master Looter as the loot type for the group.
entries.selected_lotto: Group Leader selected Lottery as the loot type for the group.
entries.selected_free4all: Group Leader selected Free For All as the loot type for the group.
entries.removed: You have been removed from the group.
entries.prose_split_coins_self: [GROUP] You split %TU credits and receive %TT credits as your share.
entries.prose_split: [GROUP] You receive %DI credits as your share.
entries.problem_transferring: There was a problem transferring items to your inventory.   You may pick them up from the corpse.
entries.only_players_in_space: You may only group with players in space.
entries.notify_unknown: [GROUP] %TU sent an unknown group notify message.
entries.notify_partial_loot: [GROUP] %TU was unable to loot %DI items from %TT.
entries.notify_partial_coin_loot_int: [GROUP] %TU failed to loot credits from %TT. %DI credits remain on the corpse.
entries.notify_no_loot: [GROUP] %TU attempted to loot %TT, but was unable to carry any of the %DI items.
entries.notify_error_loot: [GROUP] %TU looted %TT, but there was an error in the process.
entries.notify_cloned_city: [GROUP] %TU has been cloned at a facility in %TO.
entries.notify_cloned: [GROUP] %TU has been cloned at a non-city facility.
entries.not_master_looter: You cannot use the Loot All option because you are not the Master Looter for your group.
entries.no_loot_lotto: You cannot use the Loot All option because your group is set to Lottery.
entries.no_loot_group: You cannot use the Loot All option because you are in a group.
entries.no_disband_owner: You may not remove the owner of your ship from the group.  You may eject first if you wish to leave the group.
entries.must_eject_first: You are not allowed to do that while in a ship.  Please eject first.
entries.must_be_leader: You must be the group leader perform this action.
entries.must_be_invited: You must be invited to join a group.
entries.master_only: Only the Master Looter is allowed to loot!  Currently the Master Looter is set to %TO.
entries.master_loot_all: The master looter has looted all items from the corpse.
entries.leader_only_master: Only the Group Leader can set the looting options.  Your group is currently set to Master Looter.
entries.leader_only_lottery: Only the Group Leader can set the looting options.  Your group is currently set to Lottery.
entries.leader_only_free4all: Only the Group Leader can set the looting options.  Your group is currently set to Free-For-All.
entries.leader_only: Only the Group Leader can set the looting options.
entries.invite_target: %TT invites you to join a group.  Type /join to accept.
entries.invite_no_target_self: You must supply a target to invite.
entries.invite_leader: You invite %TT to join your group.
entries.info_prompt: Warning! The following information is NOT real-time updated. It is only guaranteed valid at the time of opening.
entries.group_only: You can only set or check group looting options if you are in a group.
entries.full_inventory: %TT has a full inventory and cannot loot %TO.
entries.full: You may not invite someone while your group is full.
entries.free_for_all_loot_all: The corpse has been looted of all items.
entries.decline_self: You decline to join the group.
entries.corpse_empty: This corpse has no items in its inventory.
entries.considering_your_group: %TT has already been invited to join your group.
entries.choose_master_looter: Choose a Master Looter from the list of available players:
